lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored 18 points to lead Germany to a 76-75 victory against Brazil yesterday in a world championships warm-up in Nanjing, China. Cleveland Cavaliers center Anderson Varejao had 25 points for Brazil. Nowitzki, the Dallas Mavericks star, added 16 rebounds.
